caption.title: Top 20 significantly enriched pathways as determined by Gene Ontology (GO) enrichment analysis in dithranol-treated lesional skin at end of treatment compared to baseline from 15 patients with psoriasis.
caption.p: (GO was done using Cytoscape software; Bindea et al., 2009; Shannon et al., 2003 a.o. = among others).
